page.title: 14WHAT I DID YESTERDAY
page.content: Yesterday was Wednesday and I had to go for my interview at my new school,Bangor Grammar School.I had to see my Housemaster who looks after the pupils in Ward House to see if they settle in to their new school. He asked me various questions like: What's your favourite television programme? What's your favourite sport? Do you have a hobby? He gave me some leaflets and then I had to wait for a while before seeing the headmaster Mr.Patton. Once I was in his office he asked my Dad to sign a document saying that I would be allowed to go to the school. After I left his office,I went back to school to play rugby.
